articles.title: Murder case in Australia reveals AI-generated mishap
articles.summary: An Australian lawyer filed submissions in a murder case that included incorrect information generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Murder case in Australia reveals AI-generated mishap
articles.translated_summary: An Australian lawyer filed submissions in a murder case that included incorrect information generated by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Australian lawyer sorry for AI errors in murder case, including fake quotes and made up cases
articles.summary: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Australian lawyer sorry for AI errors in murder case, including fake quotes and made up cases
articles.translated_summary: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Expects to Spend ‘Trillions’ on Infrastructure
articles.summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman wants to spend trillions of dollars over time on the infrastructure required to develop and run artificial intelligence services. He just needs to figure out a way to raise that kind of money.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Expects to Spend ‘Trillions’ on Infrastructure

articles.title: How AI Is Set to Reshape the Workplace | Bloomberg Tech: Europe 8/15/2025
articles.summary:
From the job cuts at Microsoft and Salesforce to Meta's multi-billion dollar hiring spree, artificial intelligence's impact on the labor market is already being felt. But what about the longer-term effects on the jobs available? Meet the European innovators set to redefine the future of work with tools including life-like avatars to next-gen voice AI.
"Bloomberg Tech: Europe" spotlights the biggest names and trends shaping the region's technology ecosystem as the global competition heats up. This monthly, 30-minute magazine-style show features in-depth interviews with top technology leaders, as well as major investors and policymakers - giving you a compelling A to Z of the most consequential innovations, opportunities and challenges. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Euan Blair: AI Transition Needs An 'All In' Approach
articles.summary: It's clear Artificial Intelligence will transform the way we work. But how should workers - and their employers - position for success? Euan Blair, the CEO of upskilling platform Multiverse, says the key is to go 'all in' on AI. Blair spoke to Tom Mackenzie on "Bloomberg Tech: Europe." (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: AI will be more disruptive than COVID. Which party can seize the moment?
articles.summary: If the artificial intelligence boom happens while President Trump is in office, he'll be blamed for the loss of millions of middle-class jobs. But will Democrats offer a vision for a new workforce?
